page.title: 10THE ABATTOIR AT WESTERLEIGH
page.content: Built in 1980,the{abattoir}provides work for 110 people. Most workers live in{Bristol}but some come from Cardiff and Cornwall.Cows,pigs,sheep and goats are{slaughtered painlessly.}Pigs,sheep and goats are killed by two men.One gives an electric shock with tongs and a second man slits their throats. Cattle are led through a corridor where they are killed with a bolt gun in the head.Afterwards a gate opens and the cows fall out,being picked up on a metal hook and their throats slit.{Pakistani}people hold a special ceremony before their goats are slaughtered.Some of the animal guts and hoofs are used for{fertilizer and meat sent out to the butcher trade in this country.Some meat is sent abroad to France,Belgium,Germany even Egypt.
